title: LAP: The Urban Informal Economy Revisited (Spanish)
description: Alexander Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editor Ray Bromely on the subject of the January 2018 issue: "The Urban Informal Economy Revisited."
